MATCH (n:Label1) RETURN n AS node: Find all nodes and return all nodes.
MATCH (n:Label1) WHERE n.property1 > num: Find all nodes that their property is greater than a number
MATCH (n:Country) WHERE n.country_risk > num RETURN n
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner) WHERE n.agg_score > num RETURN n
MATCH (n:Supplier) WHERE n.supply_network_triangles_norm > num RETURN n
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner) WHERE n.agg_score > num RETURN n
MATCH (n:Supplier) WHERE n.supply_network_triangles_norm > num RETURN n
MATCH (n:Label1)-[r]->(m:Label2) RETURN: Return the value of all variables.
MATCH (n:Country)-[r]->(m:) RETURN *
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN *
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN *
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN *
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN *
Reture the nodes that have a relationship
MATCH (n:Country)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n,m
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n,m
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n,m
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n,m
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n,m
MATCH (n:Label1)-[r:R1]->(m:Label2) RETU: Reture the nodes that satisfied the relationship
MATCH (n:Label1)-[r]->(m:Label2) RETURN: Use alias for result column name.
MATCH (n:Country)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel
Sort the result. The default order is ASCENDING.
MATCH (n:Country)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel ORDER BY n.name
Limit the number of rows to a maximum of 10, for the result set.
MATCH (n:Country)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel LIMIT 10
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel LIMIT 10
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel LIMIT 10
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel LIMIT 10
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN n AS node, r AS rel LIMIT 10
The number of matching rows.
MATCH (n:Country)-[r]->(m:) RETURN count(*) AS nbr
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN count(*) AS nbr
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN count(*) AS nbr
MATCH (n:BusinessPartner)-[r]->(m:) RETURN count(*) AS nbr
MATCH (n:Supplier)-[r]->(m:) RETURN count(*) AS nbr
MATCH (n:Label1)-[r:R1]->(m:Label2) WHER: Return the property of node m where the property of node n is filtered
